introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Codhub.dev. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use our services.

services.title: 2. Services
services.content: Codhub.dev provides professional software development services, including:

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All intellectual property rights related to our services and products, including software, designs, and documentation, remain the property of Codhub.dev unless otherwise agreed in writing.

payment.title: 4. Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment terms are specified in each project agreement. Unless otherwise agreed, payment must be made within 30 days of invoice date.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Codhub.dev shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate the agreement upon written notice if the other party breaches any material term and fails to cure such breach within 30 days.

governingLaw.title: 7. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France.

dataController.title: 1. Data Controller
dataController.content: Codhub.dev, registered in France, is the data controller responsible for processing your personal data.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect and process the following types of data:
dataCollection.personal: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
dataCollection.usage: Usage data (IP address, browser type, pages visited)
dataCollection.technical: Technical data related to our services

purposes.title: 3. Purposes of Processing
purposes.content: We process your data to provide our services, communicate with you, improve our offerings, and comply with legal obligations.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
rights.erasure: Request erasure of your personal data
rights.restriction: Restrict processing of your personal data

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your personal data.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.name: Codhub.dev
publisher.siret: SIRET number: XXX XXX XXX XXXXX

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.content: This website is hosted by: [Hosting provider details]

object.title: 1. Object
object.content: These general terms and conditions govern the business relationship between Codhub.dev and its clients for all services provided.

conditions.title: 2. Acceptance of Conditions
conditions.content: By engaging our services, clients accept these terms and conditions in their entirety.

prices.title: 3. Prices and Payment
prices.content: All prices are quoted excluding VAT unless otherwise stated. Payment terms are net 30 days from invoice date unless otherwise agreed.

warranty.title: 4. Warranty
warranty.content: We provide a 3-month warranty on all developed software against defects in workmanship.

disputes.title: 5. Disputes
disputes.content: In case of dispute, the parties will attempt to reach an amicable solution. If unsuccessful, French courts will have exclusive jurisdiction.
